item.description:
Cat's Meow Speakeasy gangster, flapper night!
Thursday, March 7, 2013 5:30 - 8:30 pm
Four Points by Sheraton, Leominster MA

WOWZA! Step back in time to the roaring 20s and enjoy an opportunity to cut the rug and sample delicious dishes and fantastic fare from some of the area’s top food and beverage establishments. Help HealthAlliance Hospital to raise funds for our Cancer Center Campaign. Now you can buy your tickets or make a donation on line. For more information, contact the Health Alliance Hospital Development Office at 978-466-4838. Be there or be square – the joint will be hoppin’!

A premier tasting event

Guys and Gals, you don’t want to miss this!
Celebrating our 7th Year of Jumpin’ & Jivin’!
Cat’s Meow Speakeasy Tasting Gala Help raise much-needed funds for cancer care. The joint will be hoppin’

Entertainment By
The Tom Nutile Big Band & Dance2Swing Studios
(www.Dance2Swing.com)
Tickets: $50 per person

(sponsorship opportunities available)

Be there or be square!

All gangster, flapper and 1920s speakeasy attire welcome but not required.
There will be a special raffle for everyone who comes dressed in costume!
Please note that this is a 21+ event

Cut the rug and enjoy an evening of entertainment and delicious fare

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Cat's Meow Speakeasy Gangster, Flapper Night!
